attributes.action: Stop public funding of the BBC due to its discriminatory job application rules
attributes.additional_details:
News has broken within the last 24 hours that they have very recently advertised a job for two of their non-race related TV programs, that only people from ethnic minorities can apply.
This effectively excludes and discriminates against 80.5% of the UK population, the majority of whom are tax payers and TV licence holders, the very people that financially support the BBC.
attributes.background: To withdraw all public funding mainly through the TV licence, but also tax payer funds.

rejection.details:
The BBC is primarily funded through the licence fee, so if you want this funding to end you might like to sign the following petitions:

Abolish the TV licence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586818

Hold a binding referendum on the future of the TV licence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587212
